thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ING Q4 Total Underlying Income At 4.37 Billion Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ING Q4 Total Underlying Income At 4.37 Billion Euros
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Ing Groep Nv:
* ING POSTS 2017 NET RESULT OF EUR 4,905 MILLION; 4Q17 NET RESULT OF EUR 1,015 MILLION
* REMAIN COMMITTED TO TARGETS WE COMMUNICATED * PROPOSE A FULL-YEAR 2017 CASH DIVIDEND OF EUR 0.67 PER SHARE
* Q4 INTEREST RESULT EUR 3.5 BILLION VERSUS EUR 3.39 BILLION IN REUTERS POLL
* Q4 TOTAL UNDERLYING INCOME EUR 4.37 BILLION VERSUS EUR 4.36 BILLION IN REUTERS POLL
* END-Q4 CORE TIER 1 RATIO 14.7 PERCENT VERSUS 14.5 PERCENT IN REUTERS POLL
* Q4 UNDERLYING NET RESULT EUR 1.00 BLN‍​ VERSUS EUR 1.38 BILLION YEAR AGO
* Q4 NET RESULT BANKING EUR 1.00 BILLION VERSUS EUR 0.60 BILLION YEAR AGO‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
